quiz.question: How old was Hezekiah when he became king and reigned in Jerusalem?

What did Hezekiah do in the first month of the first year of his reign?
options: Hezekiah opened the doors of the temple of the Lord and repaired them
Hezekiah removed the high places, smashed the scared stones and cut down the Asherah poles
quiz.answer: Hezekiah opened the doors of the temple of the Lord and repaired them

quiz.question: What did Hezekiah sacrifice unto the Lord after the temple was purified as a sin offering?
options: Seven bulls, seven rams, seven male lambs and seven male goats
Eight bulls, seven rams, eight male lambs and seven male goats
Seven bulls, seven rams, seven male lambs and twelve male goats
quiz.answer: Seven bulls, seven rams, seven male lambs and seven male goats
